Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Francisco
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Western, Lawrence and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Francisco.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Western, Lawrence and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Francisco.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at O'Hare and Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare and Forest Park. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at O'Hare and Forest Park. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
